      • getChecksum

        public String getChecksum(String fileName,
                          String algorithm)
        Get the digest of a closed file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name to get the digest for
        algorithm - the digest algorithm
        Returns:
        the digest or null if the digest was not requested. The digest will be lower case hex encoded.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the file is still open or was never opened

      • getSize

        Get the size of a closed file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name to get the size for
        Returns:
        the size
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the file is still open or was never opened
